history.proof: intros H1 H2. hauto lq: on drew: off use: nat2Zp_mult, Zp_mult_assoc, Zp_mult_one, nat2Zp_one.

original: intros H1 H2. intros H3 H4 H5. rewrite H2. rewrite H1. rewrite <- nat2Zp_mult. intros H6. rewrite H4. rewrite <- nat2Zp_expo. rewrite H6. rewrite nat2Zp_mult. simpl. rewrite H3. rewrite nat2Zp_mult. symmetry. rewrite Zp_mult_revert. - rewrite <- H5. reflexivity. - apply nat2Zp_one.
